description: A way to easily generate code inside your project

name.description: Will be available with cli via codegen {name}

scope.description: List of glob patterns for the ai to add as context for this prompt.

destination.description: (Relative) path to put the resulting code or text.

prompt.description:
You can use these variables in your prompt: 
- ${scope}: the scope of files.
- ${previous}: The previous version of the file at destination.
- ${message}: extra message that was present in the cli.
